items.name: static let attributedStringForRange: NSAccessibility.ParameterizedAttribute
items.desc: Does not use attributes from Appkit/AttributedString.h (NSAttributedString).

items.name: static let boundsForRange: NSAccessibility.ParameterizedAttribute
items.desc: The rectangle (NSValue containing an NSRect value) enclosing the specified range of characters (NSValue containing an NSRange value). If the range crosses a line boundary, the returned rectangle will fully enclose all the lines of characters.

items.name: static let cellForColumnAndRow: NSAccessibility.ParameterizedAttribute
items.desc: The cell at the specified row and column.

items.name: static let layoutPointForScreenPoint: NSAccessibility.ParameterizedAttribute
items.desc: The point in the layout area (NSValue) corresponding to the specified point on the screen (NSValue).

items.name: static let layoutSizeForScreenSize: NSAccessibility.ParameterizedAttribute
items.desc: The size of the layout area in points (NSValue) corresponding to the specified screen size (NSValue).

items.name: static let lineForIndex: NSAccessibility.ParameterizedAttribute
items.desc: The line number (NSNumber) of the specified character (NSNumber).

items.name: static let rangeForIndex: NSAccessibility.ParameterizedAttribute
items.desc: The full range of characters (NSValue containing an NSRange value), including the specified character, which compose a single glyph (NSNumber).

items.name: static let rangeForLine: NSAccessibility.ParameterizedAttribute
items.desc: The range of characters (NSValue containing an NSRange value) corresponding to the specified line number (NSNumber).

items.name: static let rangeForPosition: NSAccessibility.ParameterizedAttribute
items.desc: The range of characters (NSValue containing an NSRange value) composing the glyph at the specified point (NSValue containing an NSPoint value).

items.name: static let rtfForRange: NSAccessibility.ParameterizedAttribute
items.desc: The RTF data (NSData) describing the specified range of characters (NSValue containing an NSRange value).

items.name: static let screenPointForLayoutPoint: NSAccessibility.ParameterizedAttribute
items.desc: The screen point (NSValue) corresponding to the specified point in the layout area (NSValue).

items.name: static let screenSizeForLayoutSize: NSAccessibility.ParameterizedAttribute
items.desc: The size of the screen in points (NSValue) corresponding to the specified size of the layout area (NSValue).

items.name: static let stringForRange: NSAccessibility.ParameterizedAttribute
items.desc: The substring (NSString) specified by the range (NSValue containing an NSRange value).

items.name: static let styleRangeForIndex: NSAccessibility.ParameterizedAttribute
items.desc: The full range of characters (NSValue containing an NSRange value), including the specified character (NSNumber), which have the same style.
